index.file_summary: Single-page portfolio: sticky header/nav, hero, projects grid, about, contact form. Uses CSS variables + utility classes for layout; anchors link to section ids.
Design system + layout styles: color tokens, spacing scale, responsive grid, button styles, card components. Includes dark-mode via prefers-color-scheme.
Inline-friendly avatar illustration used in hero/about sections.

issues.title: Hero layout wraps awkwardly on small phones
issues.summary: On ~360px width, the hero heading pushes buttons below fold; consider smaller h1 size + tighter spacing.

issues.title: Contact form submit does nothing
issues.summary: Form is currently a placeholder (action '#'). Decide: mailto, Netlify forms, or a minimal backend endpoint.

issues.title: Dark mode contrast for link hover
issues.summary: The link color mix is a bit dim on OLED screens; tune amber mix or add underline on hover.
